ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: What will convey to you what the steep ascent is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you comprehend what the Steep ascent is? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And what do you know what that difficult steep is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what Aqaba is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what have you understood, what the valley is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know the path that is steep
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you comprehend what the uphill road is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and what shall teach thee what is the steep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Ascent is! -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What will explain to you what the ascent is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what shall make thee understand that which the steep is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is the uphill task?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee the path that is steep?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know the path that is steep?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What could let you know what the height is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And what will explain to you what the ascent is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:12] And what will show you, [what will] make known to you, what the obstacle is?, that he is to surmount — intended to emphasise its enormity (this statement is a parenthetical one). He explains the way to surmount it by saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ah, what will convey unto thee) O Muhammad (what the Ascent is!) it is a smooth hurdle between Paradise and hell. Allah said this to arouse the Prophet's astonishment.
